description:
Alina became a guild receptionist because she thought it`d be an easy, safe, secure job. However, in reality, she`s so swamped with work that she`s stuck pulling overtime day after day... and she`s had enough!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Céhrecepciós vagyok, mindössze egy békés életre vágyom
Guild no Uketsukejou nano de, Heion na Seikatsu o Shitai to Omoimasu
I`m a Guild Receptionist, So I Want a Peaceful Life
ギルドの受付嬢なので, 平穏な生活をしたいと思います
